mapper.select: SELECT ex_no, ex_content, u_id, to_char(ex_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as ex_regdate FROM expect ORDER BY ex_no desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expect(ex_no, u_id, ex_content, s_num) VALUES(expect_seq.nextval, #{u_id}, #{ex_content}, #{s_num})
mapper.update: UPDATE expect SET ex_content = #{ex_content}, ex_update = SYSDATE WHERE ex_no = #{ex_no}
